Package com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.communication

Class MessageController

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.communication.MessageController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/messages") public class MessageController extends Object
Controller for handling requests related to Messages.
